description:
The final, tiebreaking game of the Gaen Cup between Gao and Tasuku gets underway. Gao is still confident he can help his friend see the error of his ways. Meanwhile, Takihara and Stella go on a special mission and find a big surprise waiting for them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 龍炎寺タスクvs未門牙王
